text: Hugh IV may refer to: *Hugh IV of Lusignan (c.1026), the fourth lord of Lusignan *Hugh IV of Maine (died in 1051) *Hugh IV, Duke of Burgundy (1213–1271), a duke of Burgundy *Hugh IV of Rodez (c. 1212 – 1274) *Hugh IV, Count of Angoulême (1259–1303) *Hugh IV of Cyprus (c. 1295–1359), a King of Cyprus
title: Hugh IV
